title.rendered: Stookin 12v dc high pressure mini water washer pump-Black

content.rendered:
Best 12v DC Water Pump for Hand Sanitizer Machine and Other Applications

Used as Windshield Washer Pump in Cars, Hand Sanitizer Spray Machine and Various Science Projects

High flow rate and strong lift head for efficient water circulation

small water circulation applications

excerpt.rendered: This is a mini size water pump that works on 12V DC. It is extremely simple and easy to use. Just connect the inlet to a water source, connect a suitable pipe and power the motor to start pumping water. Great for building science projects, fire-extinguishers, fire fighting robots, fountains, waterfalls, plant watering systems etc. Also being used for sanitizer systems.
